channel.title: Recruiting for Solar Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Recruiting for Solar Village" - The Village Hidden In The Sun - anybody wishing to join a friendly, growing village which is getting stronger every day, see inside for details!

item.title: Recruiting for Solar Village
item.content:encoded:
Of course I cant let everyone know what our actual village particulars are, as that would be like giving a bank robber the keys to the safe lol!

Anyone wishing to join however is of course more than welcome, were always friendly. I myself am usually lingering around in the village ready to help however I can and answer general questions.

If you do decide to join our Village, please state in the box that SimonSan referred you, this way we can confirm how you got to our village.

Thanks, SimonSan
